title: Why should I floss, isn't brushing enough?
description: The space between your teeth and in hard to reach areas for conventional brushing can be a breeding ground for harmful oral bacteria and plaque build-up. Using floss to get into these areas can provide you with a good way of cleaning away the bacteria and reducing the risk of gum disease and cavities developing.

title: How can I get my kids to brush their teeth?
description: Start the oral hygiene early. It's never too early to make brushing and flossing a part of their morning and nightly routines.
